title: [K-12] Science Learning Enhancement Program through Medical Simulation Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Life Sciences and Healthcare Systems
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning environment using VR equipment, with problem-solving activities based on medical scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given medical emergency scenarios in VR simulations within three steps and establish response strategies
They complete team-based medical decision-making tasks with an 85%+ success rate in gamified assessment systems
They can explain complex physiological processes through visual and interactive methods using digital game mechanics
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
